details.page_empty: Select a server to display the details

labels.heading: Client application configuration
labels.config_description: first, create an app on your server, then scan the QR code to configure this client instance.

servers.invalid_setup_form_value: invalid form value, please enter valid values.
servers.permission_request_canceled: you have canceled the request, the camera permission is required to scan the QR
servers.camera_permission_required: the camera permission is required to scan the QR, please allow the permission to continue the configuration.
servers.invalid_qr_value: invalid QR code value, please scan the QR code on the Client Setup page.
servers.failed_to_read_qr_value: failed to read the QR code, please try again.
servers.permission_denied: you have denied the camera permission, please enable the permission from the setting.
